%N A035807 Coordination sequence for lattice D*_44 (with edges defined by l_1 norm = 1).
%D A035807 J. Serra-Sagrista, Enumeration of lattice points in l_1 norm, Information Processing Letters, 76, no. 1-2 (2000), 39-44.
%H A035807 <a href="/index/Rec#order_44">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (44, -946, 13244, -135751, 1086008, -7059052, 38320568, -177232627, 708930508, -2481256778, 7669339132, -21090682613, 51915526432, -114955808528, 229911617056, -416714805914, 686353797976, -1029530696964, 1408831480056, -1761039350070, 2012616400080, -2104098963720, 2012616400080, -1761039350070, 1408831480056, -1029530696964, 686353797976, -416714805914, 229911617056, -114955808528, 51915526432, -21090682613, 7669339132, -2481256778, 708930508, -177232627, 38320568, -7059052, 1086008, -135751, 13244, -946, 44, -1).
%F A035807 a(m)=add(2^k*binomial(n, k)*binomial(m-1, k-1), k=0..n)+2^n*binomial((n+2*m)/2-1, n-1); with n=44.
